metadata.name: Buddy In A Box
metadata.description:
A Mod that realized the Idea by Ashklain on reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/bindingofisaac/comments/5o587n/idea_buddy_in_a_box/
Adds an Item, "Buddy in a box". When picked up, Grants Isaac a random baby using any co-op baby sprite at random. Its stats are randomly chosen when picked up. When finishing a floor, the baby will be fully randomized again.
Programming by Scayze (me)
